title: Subway Surfers
description: Run endlessly through the subway tracks, dodge obstacles, and collect coins in this popular running game!

title: Fireboy and Watergirl
description: Solve puzzles and cooperate with both characters to reach the exits safely in this fun adventure game!

title: Minecraft Classic
description: Build and explore in this classic version of the popular sandbox game!

title: Slope
description: Navigate a ball through a challenging 3D course with gravity and speed!
